detail_desc: Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with short sleeves, buttons down the front and a flared skirt with gathered tiers. Unlined.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Hair elastics with bows and shiny plastic beads at the ends. No metal clips.
Block-patterned scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes along the short sides.
Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with a flounce across the chest, seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Wide shirt that tapers at the waist to create a dramatic silhouette. Wide turn-down collar, a concealed button band, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with cuff plackets and wide, buttoned cuffs. Folded, visible seams down the sleeves and front, and a rounded hem.
Platform Derby shoes in imitation leather with a brogue pattern and lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles. Platform 4 cm, heel 5 cm.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake welt pocket at the back and slim legs with slits at the hems.
Short top in an airy cotton weave. Square neckline with a narrow elastication, short, elasticated puff sleeves and elasticated hem.
Vest tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Straight-cut shirt in airy cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in slightly stretchy denim with a zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Baby Exclusive. Garter-stitched romper suit knitted in soft organic cotton with buttons on one shoulder and at the crotch. Raglan sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hems.

Jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a drawstring hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with gathered seams and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with a print motif, wrapover hood, dropped shoulders and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a dungaree dress and top in cotton. Dress in a pattern weave with an elasticated waist, patch pockets and adjustable straps with knots at the front and a fastening at the back. Short-sleeved jersey top with an opening and button at the back of the neck and frills on the sleeves.
Scarf in soft, patterned satin.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton piqué.
V-neck blouse in a crinkled weave with 3/4-length sleeves with flounced cuffs, and a flounce at the hem.
Hat in a soft, chunky knit with a wide turned-up hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
High-waisted jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist and twisted drawstring. Broderie anglaise and a scalloped edge at the hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Spotted mesh cap with an inner terry sweatband and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a funnel collar that has a wrapover front, kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Aqua shoes in patterned scuba fabric with elastication around the top, a loop front and back, and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and gathered seam down the back and sleeves. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric. Tight fit. The top is made from recycled polyester.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly and pockets in the side seams.
Metal rings in various designs, decorated with coloured plastic stones.
Calf-length skirt in a soft knit containing some wool. High waist, a covered elastic waistband and a slit at the back. Unlined. The polyester content of the skirt is recycled.
Vest top in airy linen jersey. Deep V-neck at the back with a knot detail.
Cardigan in soft, pointelle-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, wide dress in a crinkled weave with gathered details and pleats. V-neck, long balloon sleeves, wide cuffs with covered buttons, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Short suede skirt with decorative seams. Visible zip at the back. Lined.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Dress in checked cotton flannel with a rounded collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with a tab and button, and a gathered seam at the waist with a flared skirt.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Striped top in soft cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Straight-cut T-shirt in sturdy jersey.

Grandad shirt in a supersoft cotton weave with a contrasting colour trim around the collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Tights that have a shaping effect on the tummy, thighs and calves while also encouraging blood circulation in the legs. Elasticated waist. 100 denier.
Long, circular skirt in a double layer of tulle to create extra movement and width. High waist with wide, covered elastication and a small frill trim at the top. Raw-edge hem. Jersey lining.
Short dungaree shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, adjustable straps and a fake fly. Front pocket, side pockets, back pockets, buttons at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on one sleeve and a gently rounded hem.
Block-coloured top in sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, stand-up collar, zip at the top, ribbing at the cuffs and short slits in the sides.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless playsuit in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Wrapover, draped front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the neckline, an elasticated, smocked seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs.
Patterned bow tie with a matching handkerchief. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm. Size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a round neck, print motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in stretch jersey with a denim look. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Quilted, lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a soft, matt finish. Detachable, lined hood, small stand-up collar, zip down the front and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
5-pocket jeans in stretch, supersoft denim with a regular waist, a ribbed section on the inside at the back of the waist and a concealed drawstring at the front. Zip fly and slim legs.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Flared, calf-length skirt in viscose crêpe with a concealed zip at the waist. Unlined.
Wide, high-waisted, calf-length trousers in sturdy jersey with concealed elastication at the waist and straight legs.
Sleeveless blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar, ties at the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.
3/4-length jumpsuit in viscose jersey with a deep wrapover V-neck, a seam with narrow, concealed elastication at the waist, a low crotch and wide legs. Unlined.
Trainers in imitation leather with a terry appliqué at one side, lightly padded edge, lacing at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Fitted top in crinkled jersey with smocking at the front and back and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the hems. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.

Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a lace appliqué on the front. Dropped shoulders with frills containing glittery threads and with overlocked edges, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Large earrings in metal and plastic. Length 5 cm.

Oversized shirt jacket in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and diagonal side pockets. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and bottom. V-neck, short puff sleeves with concealed elastication, a seam at the waist and a draped skirt with an asymmetric hem. Lined.
Top in Tencel™ lyocell denim with short cap sleeves, a V-neck with pin-tucks, and a gently rounded hem.
Jacket in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood and zip down the front. Front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long, sleeveless dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
